price: Zira onlar Allah’tan gelecek bir şeyi senden savamazlar. Zalimler, birbirlerinin velisidir. Allah da takva sahiplerinin velisidir.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innahum lan yugh'nū ʿanka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna al-ẓālimīna baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqīna
